function ERI_EP05_16()
    --.結-1【3月第1週】「戦姫と姫皇」
    SaveData.Title = "戦姫と姫皇"

    --//BG：メインストリート（夏）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Coming to Yuriai Private Academy together with Akira, the first thing I felt was a sense of discomfort. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav",2000,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Huh? There are so many people I don't know?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0839.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "Aren't they students from the middle school division or sister schools? Is it allowed to observe the Princess Election?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0840.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "That's why I, too, could come to school with confidence today." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Y-yeah, that's true." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "But I feel like there are not only unfamiliar uniforms but also a lot of adults here." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0841.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised
 "Eh? You're right, I even spotted some men in suits." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I noticed a strange feeling as I saw unusual types of people on the main street. A tinge of anxiety and unease stirred within me. ]])

    MSG([[ Soon, I would come to realize that this was not just my imagination. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//BG：大講堂正面（スポットライト無し）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ ― Thirty minutes until the 'Princess Emperor Election' begins. Suddenly, new information and rules were announced on the day itself, and we were urgently gathered in the main auditorium. ]])
    --//BU：アキラ（焦り）、リラ（苦笑）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0842.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Flustered
 "Ugh... There are definitely more people here than at the school festival." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0582.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wry smile
 "To think they'd announce the outside guests at the last minute. That's ruthless." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0583.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "Apparently, the guests are from companies related to the Himegami family. No doubt their influence is all over this." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0843.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sad
 "If that's the case... the votes of those from outside the school are hopeless." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：ヒユ（真剣）、ウラン（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0365.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Serious
 "They're doing a live broadcast online and accepting votes online too!? This is the first time in Yuriai Private Academy's history!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0381.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 "Votes from outside the school overwhelmingly favor the highly popular Hermes-sama. Announcing such measures on the day itself is despicable." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The announced information and rules, as everyone is discussing, involved inviting many spectators from outside the school, and accepting votes from those guests as well as online viewers. ]])

    MSG([[ All of it clearly favors the well-known Hermes-san immensely. ]])

    MSG([[ It even seemed to convey a determination to do whatever it takes to win this Princess Emperor Election. ]])

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0310.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "I was ordered by my grandfather to support the Himegami family. Seems they hold major influence in the industry." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0311.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Loud laugh
 "I just laughed it off! Haaaah ha ha ha!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】Normal
 "No matter how close one’s family is to the Himegami family, we will not accept interference!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】Normal
 "Indeed. The bonds between our hearts are far deeper than mere blood ties!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0070.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】Normal
 "I've never liked that Nemesia woman... let's make her eat those words, heh heh heh." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "Thank you all very much." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The boys' division clearly declared their support for us, and it gave me courage. ]])

    MSG([[ It's too late to panic now. We can only put all our effort into what we can do. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "No matter how disadvantageous the situation, we have to do this. Please lend me all your strength!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ ― Ten minutes until the 'Princess Emperor Election' begins. We gathered behind the stage, out of the audience's sight, and began our final strategy meeting. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "It's finally here." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：アキラ（通常）、リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0584.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "So, shall we briefly review the stage presentation? Everyone's been rushing around, and we haven’t had a proper meeting." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0585.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "Strategist Akira, <r=オナシャース>please</r>." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0844.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Flustered
 "Why me...!? Lira-pon, aren’t you getting more and more rough with me...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira pouted unhappily but began speaking with a practiced air. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0845.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "As everyone knows, the theme for this appeal is ‘Freedom.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0846.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "Hermes will undoubtedly showcase her strengths in singing and dancing. She will probably sweep over ninety percent of the audience's favor." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0586.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wry smile
 "You say that like it's a sure thing. No chance of winning, huh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "But you have a good strategy, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0847.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smile
 "Yes, I will deal with the online voters myself." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0848.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smile
 "On my channel, I introduced this election in advance in preparation for this. I already posted the voting URL on Twitter just now." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0849.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Grin
 "To try to use the power of the internet against this genius gamer AKIRA... they clearly don’t know their place." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：ヒユ（興奮）、アキラ（ニヤリ）、ウラン（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ma")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0366.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Excited
 "As expected of Akira-nee-sama...! The name ‘<r=うつひめ>Melancholy Princess</r>’ is well earned!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0850.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Flustered
 "Ugh… I told you to stop calling me ‘Melancholy Princess’." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "Hehe, princess names tend to stick no matter what, so it can’t be helped." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I couldn’t help but laugh a little at Akira’s flustered reaction. ]])

    MSG([[ I understand how she feels. I panicked too when they suddenly started calling me the ‘Battle Princess.’ ]])

    MSG([[ It reminded me that reputations spread rapidly even without one knowing. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 "Votes from external guests account for 20% of the total. Votes from Van Dyne viewers correspond to 10%." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san probably confused ‘online’ and ‘Van Dyne,’ but since it was in the middle of a serious conversation, I didn’t point it out and continued listening. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0383.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 "We can leave the Van Dyne viewers’ votes to Akira-san’s strategy. As for the external guests, we have no choice but to give up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "So the battle depends on how much of the remaining 70% of support we can gather." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Even if we capture more than half of that 70%, it’s just over 35%. Not even half. ]])

    MSG([[ To secure a majority of all votes, we need to acquire over 70% of the student body at Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ I, a national idol and the academy’s top ‘Princess,’ must win by a landslide on campus. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0312.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Don’t worry, Minato. Or rather, it’s time to start calling you Erika." ]])

    PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0313.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Erika will win. I guarantee it as your best friend." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0314.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Loud laugh
 "Even my beautiful muscles agree! Haaaah ha ha ha!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0090.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】Excited
 "We believe in you too, Erika-dono!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】Excited
 "Even if you’re a guy, Erika-dono is truly a ‘beautiful girl’!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0071.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】Excited
 "We were just weirdos before... but thanks to Erika, we changed. Next, we’ll change the academy and the Himegami family together." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：ヒユ（笑顔）、リラ（通常）、ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0367.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Smile
 "Meeting Erika-nee-sama was really the best thing that ever happened to me!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0368.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Sad
 "So... sniff... please win... win and stay my sister from now on..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0587.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "I’m seriously glad to be friends with Erika. Thanks to you, I learned that barriers of gender and talent can be overcome with effort." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ia")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0588.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "If it’s cuteness that beats you, it’s me, Lira Hoozuki. Don’t you dare lose, weed<sprite="Emoji" name="note">." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0384.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 "Erika-san, we have seriously clashed before. I still believe that the barrier of gender is not something easily broken." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0385.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smile
 "But you... Erika-san, you can break it. Please shatter the walls of discord that have arisen within Yuriai Private Academy with your own hands." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("reika_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Whee! I made it just in time!" ]])
    --//注釈：桜島麗華

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Y-you all... came?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒×MAX
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB10aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ From behind the stage, the ‘knights’ who have supported me from the very beginning revealed themselves. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("kyohka_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Kyoka Himekaido】
 "If it’s to support Erika-nee-sama, I’ll go through fire or water." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("reika_0026.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Reika Sakurajima】
 "It was tough moving with this many people though, haha." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurika】
 "Do your best, Princess Erika. We’re all watching from the audience." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ione Heiwado】
 "From the audience, I’ll definitely play the role of the cheering crowd ～<sprite="Emoji" name="note">." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Jasuko Heiwado】
 "It’s also important to rally the non-faction crowd, oh ho ho ho <sprite="Emoji" name="note">." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Meme Tsudanuma】
 "E-Erika-nee-sama... please come back to us again." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Yuri Ryuguuin】
 "No matter what the outcome, or what secrets or circumstances you bear, we will continue to revere Erika-nee-sama." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0033")
    MSG([[
    【The Knights】
 "Please do your best, Erika-nee-sama." ]])

    MSG([[ Each of the knights spoke words of encouragement to me one by one. ]])

    MSG([[ Not just Akira, the ‘Princesses,’ and the boys’ division. I’m now supported by so many people. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Tearful smile
 "Thank you, everyone." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ This past year, so much has happened. Troubled times, endless worries, and moments I cried from pain were more than once or twice. ]])

    MSG([[ But now, supported by many people, I’m about to stand on a brilliant stage like this. ]])

    MSG([[ It all started with crossdressing training that Akira and I began together— ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to the ‘Boku-hime PROJECT.’ ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    --//BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0851.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "I won’t say much now. So just one thing." ]])

    -- //CI：110・継続
    --//SE：抱き着く音
PLAY_SE("SEa024.wav")
WAIT(200)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI110a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Akira gave me a tight hug and whispered with a smile. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01eb")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0852.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smile
 "Tonight, I want to eat Minachin-don. Let’s win quickly, go shopping together afterward." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1299.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "Okay, sounds good. There’s a fish sale today, so I’m sure they’ll have good shrimp." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")


    -- //CI：110・終了
    --//SE：ブザー音
PLAY_SE("SEb024.wav")
WAIT(800)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    MSG([[ The buzzer announcing the start of the Princess Emperor Election sounded. ]])

    MSG([[ At last, the final battle begins. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1300.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Here I go, Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0853.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Wry smile
 "Good luck, Minachin." ]])
    --//BU：無し
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Surrounded by everyone’s watchful eyes, I stepped toward the center of the stage. ]])
    --//SE：黄色い歓声
PLAY_SE("SEf007.wav")
